title: Industrial Professional and Skilled 7.1 (Americas)
description:
Our Industrial – Professional and Skilled 7.1 solution is designed to measure the behaviors and experiences that underlie successful and safe performance in the workplace for specialized technical or professional industrial roles. This solution assesses mechanical comprehension and other foundational behaviors including: behaving safely and efficiently in the workplace; installing, repairing, and/or maintaining equipment and machinery; making sound mechanical decisions; maintaining an orderly work environment; and producing high quality and reliable work.
“IMPORTANT! Please note that you will need to select the correct package depending on which norm you intend to use. The package available for this product is International and Americas".
